医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NIH 的 120 万美元拨款可能有助于揭示唐氏综合症和骨髓性白血病之间的相互作用美国国立卫生研究院国家癌症研究所提供的一项为期四年、价值 120 万美元的资助可能会帮助研究人员找到唐氏综合症 (DS) 和髓性白血病 (ML) 之间相互作用的新线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2412-million-NIH-grant-may-help-unravel-the-interplay- Between-Down-syndrome-and-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2412-million-NIH-grant-may-help-unravel-the-interplay- Between-Down-syndrome-and-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bce9525d-c0b0-412c-b21c-2a695e7e3ef8 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:19:52 -0400 $1.2 million NIH grant may help unravel the interplay between Down syndrome and myeloid leukemia
研究表明急诊室免费电子烟有助于戒烟最新研究表明，尝试市售电子烟​​对于某些人成功戒烟可能很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Research-shows-free-vapes-in-emergency-rooms-aid-smoking-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Research-shows-free-vapes-in-emergency-rooms-aid-smoking-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69d0b7d2-f44e-4d0f-8fa2-da8d3ce7841f Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:14:39 -0400 Research shows free vapes in emergency rooms aid smoking cessation
研究表明延迟反馈可以增强创伤性脑损伤的学习能力凯斯勒基金会的研究人员发表了一项新颖的研究，探讨延迟反馈对中度至重度创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 个体学习的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-shows-delayed-feedback-enhances-learning-in-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-shows-delayed-feedback-enhances-learning-in-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a86a41fc-48f7-4239-8ec1-0875bad76226 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:07:06 -0400 Study shows delayed feedback enhances learning in traumatic brain injury
研究揭示了创伤性损伤后慢性脑损伤的潜在治疗方法头部的暴力打击或摇晃可导致创伤性脑损伤 (TBI)，目前美国约有 500 万人患有慢性神经退行性疾病和 TBI 引起的相关损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-pottial-treatment-for-chronic-brain-damage-following-traumatic-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-pottial-treatment-for-chronic-brain-damage-following-traumatic-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68c51e2b-da42-4671-9766-0e6a34fecac4 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:00:00 -0400 Study unveils potential treatment for chronic brain damage following traumatic injury
Taletrectinib 在 ROS1+ 肺癌患者中显示出高缓解率和安全性ROS1 酪氨酸激酶抑制剂 (TKI) taletrectinib 在未接受过 TKI 治疗和接受过 TKI 治疗的 ROS1+ 非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者中表现出较高的总体反应和颅内反应，以及良好的安全性和较低的神经系统不良事件发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Taletrectinib-shows-high-response-rates-and-safety-in-ROS12b-lung-cancer-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Taletrectinib-shows-high-response-rates-and-safety-in-ROS12b-lung-cancer-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00216c15-2164-432f-9192-578ee96b1390 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 11:57:57 -0400 Taletrectinib shows high response rates and safety in ROS1+ lung cancer patients
术前化疗有望保留鼻癌和鼻窦癌的重要器官ECOG-ACRIN 癌症研究小组 (ECOG-ACRIN) 的一项临床试验结果显示，在手术切除鼻或鼻窦晚期鳞状细胞型癌症之前接受化疗的患者有显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Pre-surgery-chemotherapy-shows-promise-for-preserving-vital-organs-in-nasal-and-sinus-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Pre-surgery-chemotherapy-shows-promise-for-preserving-vital-organs-in-nasal-and-sinus-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fb0c821-3ccd-4888-bca0-e9354bb785cc Wed, 11 Sep 2024 11:55:24 -0400 Pre-surgery chemotherapy shows promise for preserving vital organs in nasal and sinus cancer
VitelloTag 方法为卵细胞基因编辑挑战提供了新的解决方案海洋生物实验室 (MBL) 开发出了一种将微型研究工具送入卵细胞和胚胎内部的新方法，解决了在许多研究生物体中使用基因编辑工具 CRISPR-Cas9 的主要瓶颈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/VitelloTag-approach-offers-new-solution-for-gene-editing-challenges-in-egg-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/VitelloTag-approach-offers-new-solution-for-gene-editing-challenges-in-egg-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=229322dd-a452-45f9-9c8d-c40435017851 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 11:49:38 -0400 VitelloTag approach offers new solution for gene editing challenges in egg cells
新的分子图谱提供了对人类生理学和疾病的见解卡塔尔威尔康奈尔医学院 (WCM-Q) 的科学家基于对 391 名志愿者的血液、尿液和唾液样本中测量的数千个分子的分析，绘制了人体及其复杂生理过程的复杂分子图谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-molecular-map-offers-insights-into- human-physiology-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-molecular-map-offers-insights-into- human-physiology-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f83ef85-caee-40ed-86f7-14f824a8a973 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 11:47:01 -0400 New molecular map offers insights into human physiology and disease
研究通过先进的功能磁共振成像技术揭示了动态大脑结构......来自西班牙国家研究委员会 (CSIC) 和埃尔切米格尔·埃尔南德斯大学 (UMH) 联合中心神经科学研究所 (IN) 的研究人员与特兰西瓦尼亚神经科学研究所（罗马尼亚）的一个团队合作，与瓦伦西亚理工大学的专家合作，开发了一种利用功能磁共振成像 (fMRI) 研究大脑连接的创新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-dynamic-brain-architecture-through-advanced-fMRI-techniques-Neuroscientists-In-Spain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-dynamic-brain-architecture-through-advanced-fMRI-techniques-Neuroscientists-In-Spain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=977effa3-f34d-4c7a-acfb-c31fd785ab87 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 10:11:26 -0400 Study unveils dynamic brain architecture through advanced fMRI techniques Neuroscientists In Spain ...
创伤暴露与女性大脑年龄加速和阿尔茨海默病风险有关随着人口中位年龄的增加，被诊断患有阿尔茨海默病的人数也在增加。随着技术的进步，确定大脑年龄和识别血液中的阿尔茨海默病生物标志物变得更加容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trauma-exposure-linked-to-accelerated-brain-age-and-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trauma-exposure-linked-to-accelerated-brain-age-and-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5d76332-38c5-43f1-87b3-cd59e1abfd54 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 10:06:39 -0400 Trauma exposure linked to accelerated brain age and Alzheimer's risk in women
